resume_text:
NAME: Carol Williams
EMAIL: carol.williams@example.com
PHONE: (555) 246-8013

SUMMARY:
Results-driven DevOps Engineer with 5 years of experience in automating and optimizing infrastructure. Expertise in cloud technologies and CI/CD pipelines.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins, Git, Ansible, Python, Linux

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions - DevOps Engineer (2020 - Present)
- Automated infrastructure provisioning and deployment using Terraform.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker.

System Admin Inc - System Administrator (2018 - 2020)
- Managed and maintained Linux servers.
- Troubleshooted system issues and implemented solutions.

EDUCATION:
MIT - Bachelor's in Computer Engineering (2018)

CERTIFICATIONS:
Certified Kubernetes Administrator
